pages.text: Mining in this world is the only way you will be able to get the best armor in the game. There are a lot of useful ores in the game and a lot can be found by just mining!$(br2)I will go over some that you might want to keep your eye on

pages.title: Magic Guidebook
pages.text: If you want an indepth guide on magic and how to use it then craft this guidebook.$(br2)The book teaches you how to use spells and spellbooks and the upgrade system, as well as how to make the staffs and armors.

pages.title: World Magic
pages.text: In this world magic is one of the strongest things you can use if not the strongest. The progression is using magic in all aspects.$(br2)Magic is essential if you want to take down large enemies and bosses, if you choose not to use magic thats fine as melee or archery has equally effective tools. But magic is the soul of progression in this world.
The necromancer is a valuable mob to kill for arcane dust but is a tough fight.
